snippet: For the last 12 years, Leatrice Eiseman, executive director of the Pantone Color Institute, has headed the committee that chooses Pantone’s color of the year.
abstract: Leatrice Eiseman, executive director of the Pantone Color Institute, describes how she helps choose Pantone's paint color of the year.
lead_paragraph: For the last 12 years, Leatrice Eiseman, executive director of the Pantone Color Institute, has headed the committee that chooses Pantone’s color of the year.

headline.seo: Q&A — Leatrice Eiseman of the Pantone Color Institute
headline.main: A Pantone Executive on Changing the Country’s Tone
headline.print_headline: She Wants to Change the Country’s Tone
